name: Rotate The Ball Free
description:
“Very addictive, great puzzle game. Each level makes you have to think fast.” – User review.

“Good game - This game us so worth 0.99 cent :) i been waiting for this gane for a long time” – User review.

“amazing love this game its really fun!” – User review.

Rotate the Ball is an addictive physics puzzle game. Rotate the balls through many challenging levels. Pick up the stars and roll to the bubble portal to escape from these bizarre worlds. Use touch screen buttons to tilt the game to help the balls escape.

*** Features ***

- Physics based engine
- Multiple enemies and platform types
